welcome:
Welcome to the P2:MM Launcher!

Press
"Start Game" to launch the mod!

Be sure to check out the Settings Menu to customize
the launcher and your play sessions!
mount_nodlc_toast:
Game's path is missing some DLC folders!! 
Please verify game integrity on steam.
mount_nopath_toast:
Game's path is invalid!! 
Please check the settings.
modfiles_not_found:
The ModFiles were not found!

These are needed for P2MM to work.
Would you like to download 
the latest version?
workshop_menu_info:
The Workshop Menu is for getting the change level
command to change to a certain workshop map.

Make sure you have the workshop map downloaded
before running the command in the Portal 2 console!
workshop_link: Enter a Steam workshop map link:
workshop_map_not_found:
Could not find workshop map!
Make sure you are subscribed
to the map and have played it
at least once.
update_client_text:
Would you like to download 
 the new version of the Client?
update_modFiles_text: Would you like to update the ModFiles?
already_updated_toast: You are already up to date!
update_inProgress_toast: The mod is now updating. Please Wait...
update_nolink_toast:
Couldn't find the download link
please visit our github to update...
xclip_not_found_description:
The shell command 'xclip',
was not found on your system!
This shell command is needed
to get the Workshop changelevel
command and paste into input prompts!
Please install 'xclip' using your
systems package manager or similar.

This is not required
but highly recommended!
wl-clipboard_not_found_description:
The shell commands for 'wl-clipboard',
were not found on your system!
These shell commands are needed to get
the Workshop changelevel command
and paste into input prompts!
Please install 'wl-clipboard' using
your systems package manager
or similar.

This is not required
but highly recommended!
xclip_needed_toast_copy:
The shell command 'xclip' is not
available!
Can't copy command!
wl-clipboard_needed_toast_copy:
The shell command 'wl-copy' is not
available!
Can't copy command!
xclip_needed_paste_msg: The shell command 'xclip' is not available! Can't paste from clipboard!
wl-clipboard_needed_paste_msg: The shell command 'wl-paste' is not available! Can't paste from clipboard!
launcher_had_to_reset:
Your config has reset.

Please check your settings!
admin_level_toast_out-of-range: Admin level must be between 0 and 6
players_toast_must_be_at_least_one_playe: There must be at least one player!
game_path-is-invalid:
Game path is invalid!
Check Portal2-Path in the settings!
game_path_undefined_fetch:
Game path was undefined,
automatically retrieving...
settings_menu_launcher_toast: The Launcher Config involves everything related to the launcher.
settings_menu_portal2_toast: The Portal 2 Config involves everything related to your Portal 2 play session.
settings_menu_languages_toast: The Players Menu allows to set addition players as admins.
Auto-Unmount-description: Automatically unmount the mod when the game closes.
Auto-Unmount-warning: It's recommended to leave this on!
Launcher-SFX-description: Makes the buttons play sound effects.
Portal2-Path-prompt: Enter the path to the Portal 2 folder.
Custom-Launch-Options-description: Launch options for Portal 2. Default is '+map mp_coop_lobby_3'.
Custom-Launch-Options-warning: Leave this to default if you don't know what it does!!
Encrypt-CVars-warning: Only use for public games, this may break some functionality!
Dev-Mode-warning: Only enable this if you know what you're doing!!
